title: Neverland v1.0.0.61 Cracked
description:
___________________________

Neverland v1.0.0.61 CRACKED
(c) Panoramik Interactive
___________________________

Published by Yahoo! Games
Developed by Panoramik Interactive
Released Sep 23, 2008
Platform Windows
Genre Adventure
___________________________

Help Diana rediscover her youth and recover lost toys
in Neverland! Seek-and-find your way through animated
levels of hidden objects and check off your list of
lost toys as you tuck each one safely into your bag.
Move hippos, helicopters and other toys to uncover
hints and tricks to help you along your way. Be careful
not to get lost on this dreamland adventure as you&#039;ll
need to help Diana set things on the right path. Will
she be able to safely restore the toys and find her way
back home? Find out on this fantastical and whimsical
journey through Neverland!

Features
- 25 levels of seek-and-find fun in over 30 locations
- Fun "Projector" mini-game
- Interact with moveable objects, levels in motion and
  talking toys
- Collect power-ups like Whistle and Pinwheel to help
  you find objects faster
- Unlimited game time

System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista
CPU: 800 Mhz
RAM: 256 MB
DirectX: 7.0
Hard Drive: 70 MB
___________________________
